title: "Colour Me Intrigued" + Chiefs-Chargers TNF Preview
itunes:title: "Colour Me Intrigued" + Chiefs-Chargers TNF Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Colleen Wolfe bring you all the latest news from around the league, starting with yet another conversation about Geno Smith. Dak Prescott will not land on Injured Reserve after undergoing surgery on his thumb (15:05), T.J. Watt avoided surgery with his pec injury (20:02), and the heroes hit other news items (21:49) before we debut a new segment: Colour (Color?) Me Intrigued (24:26). The hosts recap items from Week 1 that intrigue them going forward for this season, including the promising Chargers defense (25:42), A.J. Brown's Eagles debut (29:08), Julio Jones' Bucs debut (32:34), a surprisingly watchable Falcons offense (36:39), an encouraging performance from the Vikings (41:20), a new admission into the Kicker Club (46:58), and a few more rapid-fire style (50:25). Then, the heroes preview this week's Thursday Night Football divisional showdown between the Chargers and the Chiefs (54:18).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
